hymn.title: Earthly pleasures vainly call me

layout.singingstanza: Earth -- ly plea -- sures vain -- ly call me, I would be like Je -- sus; Noth -- ing world -- ly shall en -- thrall me, I would be like Je -- sus. Be like Je -- sus, this my song, In the home and in the throng; Be like Je -- sus, all day long! I would be like Je -- sus.

lyrics.stanza: Earthly pleasures vainly call me, I would be like Jesus; Nothing worldly shall enthrall me, I would be like Jesus.
Be like Jesus, this my song, In the home and in the throng; Be like Jesus, all day long! I would be like Jesus.
He has broken every fetter, I would be like Jesus; That my soul may serve Him better, I would be like Jesus.
All the way from earth to glory, I would be like Jesus; Telling o'er and o'er the story, I would be like Jesus.
